alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued July 24 at 6:03AM MST until July 24 at 7:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Dust Storm Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 700 AM MST. * At 602 AM MST, a wall of dust was along a line extending from 14 miles southeast of Freeman to near Estrella Sailport to near South Mountain Park, moving west at 35 mph. HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. * This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 116 and 117, and between mile markers 160 and 171. AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 121 and 168. AZ Route 202 between mile markers 52 and 55. Locations impacted include... Chandler, Avondale, Goodyear, Buckeye, Gila Bend, Sun Lakes, Maricopa, Estrella, Big Horn, Cotton Center, Liberty, South Mountain Park, Estrella Sailport, Estrella Mountain Park and Estrella Mountain Ranch. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
